description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 6/15/2006

Ridge introduces the theme of the fashion show to Stephanie, “It Begins With A Kiss,” but she doubts that it will bring Brooke back to Ridge.  Taylor declines Stephen’s offer for a date, and when she hangs up she discovers Brooke at her door, who wants to discuss Stephen.  Nick is convinced that nothing will go wrong at the show and that Brooke will soon leave Forrester Creations.
